name: Age of Antpires
description:
In Age of Antpires you will be leading a newly founded ant colony in their journey to reproducing.

  • Turn based gameplay
  • Expand your underground nest while scavenging the surface for supplies
  • Unlock new species by completing secret achievements
  • Abilities and characteristics of each insect is determined by genes
  • Breed carefully to improve your colony's abilities
  • 2 ant species, 1 aphid species and 1 ladybug species
  • 4 seasons each with different resources available (Prepare for winter!)
  • Genes and breeding
  • Procedural map generation
  • Fog of war
  • 2 map layers, the overworld and underworld
  • Very raw combat system
  • Procedural species generation. At least sprites, so genes can play into the different species's looks. I already have something started here (A tool to generate my ant sprites)
  • A 3rd map layer which would substitute the overworld and would have a different scale. (Think Rimworld)
  • More non eusocial species and AI strategies
  • AI colonies of ants, bees, wasps, termites with different strategies depending on genes
  • More biomes

All feedback is welcomed and I'll keep updating this page as the game progresses.
